Expert sales manager to align with your business

Your sales manager is responsible for setting, driving and achieving the crucial quotas and objectives for your sales division without them, your team is a ship without a rudder. If youre currently looking for sales managers to fill a new or existing role within your organisation, you need to be sure youre putting the right person at the helm. 4Twenty provides specialist sales recruitment for a range of industries including technology, media, marketing and retail. We find exceptional sales management professionals for clients throughout Melbourne, Sydney, Brisbane, Adelaide, Perth and beyond, and we can certainly find them for you too.

Our approach to finding you the right candidates

4Twentys consultants have built careers within the sales sector before turning their expertise to recruitment, so from the very beginning we have a good grasp on what it is youre looking for. Our candidates are selected from our existing network, built up from our regular seminars and university partnerships, as well as from focused advertising to engage with professionals at the level of career progression you need. Each sales management job seeker goes through a multi-layered interview process with our consultants, and only the best progress through to our recommendation stage. Finally, we only match these leading management staff with the companies theyre interested in progressing their career with, so youll know youre hiring someone whos in it for the long term.

Contact the team at 4Twenty Consulting today

We can provide the customised sales manager and sales recruitment solutions to help your team reach unprecedented growth. Get in touch with the team via email us at info@4twentyconsulting.com to tell us what it is youre looking for. Well use our extensive candidate database, modern marketing methods and meticulous screening processes to shortlist a handful of exceptional management talent for your consideration.
